summary.span: 命名空间包含 .NET Framework 缓存功能的配置处理程序类。

span.span: The namespace contains configuration handler classes for the .NET Framework caching feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的配置处理程序类是用于常规缓存与.NET Framework 应用程序一起使用。The configuration handler classes in this namespace are for general caching used with .NET Framework applications. ASP.NET 缓存的配置处理程序中包含命名空间。The configuration handlers for ASP.NET caching are contained in the namespace.
